alert.note: Alert for Chemung; Cortland; Onondaga; Southern Cayuga; Tioga; Tompkins (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 20 at 11:13PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Cayuga, western Cortland, eastern Chemung, Tioga, Onondaga and Tompkins Counties through MIDNIGHT EDT... At 1112 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Sennett to near Chemung. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Onondaga, Syracuse, Chemung, Clay, Cicero, Ithaca, Auburn, De Witt, Cortland and Van Buren. This includes the following highway exits... Interstate 90 between 34A and 39. New York Interstate 81 between 10 and 30. Interstate 86/Route 17 between 59 and 65. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 300 AM EDT for central New York...and northeastern Pennsylvania.

area.areaDesc: Chemung; Cortland; Onondaga; Southern Cayuga; Tioga; Tompkins
